name: Middleware
description: Provides a common technology platform and components to support all business lines.

overview.summary: Provides a suite of financial-grade, cloud-native foundational middleware tools with a core focus on “lightweight microservices + intelligent governance + elastic infrastructure” to help all business systems achieve efficient development and operations.

modules.name: Wecube
modules.description: Enterprise-grade IT operations management suite, providing full-stack capabilities from resource management to process orchestration.

functions.title: No-code Workflow Orchestration Engine
functions.description: No-code automation platform for ITOM (IT Operations Management), enabling full lifecycle management of enterprise IT services through a visual orchestration engine.

functions.title: Data Resource Management
functions.description: Unified management and configuration data modeling for enterprise IT infrastructure.

functions.title: Monitoring and Alert Management
functions.description: Automates integration with delivery system processes; auto-creates monitoring metrics, alerts, dashboards, enabling instant use.

functions.title: Ops Release Application Management
functions.description: Supports automated releases of multiple gray-scale versions and special material packages, simplifying the release process.

functions.title: Automated Process Management
functions.description: Provides a rich custom form ecosystem, connecting automated workflow orchestration, enabling flexible workflow configuration.

functions.title: Remote Terminal Management
functions.description: Offers comprehensive remote server management solutions.

functions.title: Container Cluster Management
functions.description: Provides Kubernetes-based cluster management; supports model registration, app deployment, multi-K8S cluster management, event monitoring, etc.

functions.title: IT & OM Best Practices
functions.description: Offers efficient multi-cloud environments and one-click application migration solutions.

modules.name: Intelligent Monitoring
modules.description: An intelligent operations platform based on AIOps concepts, providing comprehensive observability and precise alerting capabilities.

functions.title: Intelligent Operations Platform (AIOps)
functions.description: AIOps platform offering auto-configuration-free collection, computing, and standard monitoring protocol access; provides observability for application performance and business monitoring, visualizes operations with command dashboards, supports correlation analysis across metrics, logs, traces, and integrates stack/SQL viewing to achieve precise alert location; supports combined thresholds, recommended thresholds, AI-based detection, and intelligent alerting.

modules.name: WAAS
modules.description: Enterprise-grade workflow orchestration service, empowering business personnel to build end-to-end workflows independently.

functions.title: WAAS (Workflow as a Service)
functions.description: Decouples complex business into reusable atomic components; enables business teams to build end-to-end workflows via drag-and-drop engines, rule panels, preset industry template libraries, reducing new business launch cycles from weeks to hours.

modules.name: MASA
modules.description: Financial-grade cloud-native microservices platform, providing intelligent governance and elastic infrastructure.

functions.title: General Observability Platform
functions.description: Tracing/logging query and analysis.

functions.title: Distributed Message Queue
functions.description: Message storage and forwarding.

functions.title: General High-speed Caching Service
functions.description: WeRedis is a distributed caching platform developed on open-source Redis; supports subsystem-level resource control and access authentication; proactively blocks high-risk operations and dangerous accesses; built on multi-cluster, cross-IDC deployment for online scaling, achieving higher scalability at the small cluster level; provides intelligent analysis reports and warnings for fine-grained operations.

functions.title: Service Governance
functions.description: Manages service IDs, deployment regions, request/response flows.

functions.title: Reliable Message Bus
functions.description: Supports synchronous and asynchronous call integration.

functions.title: MASA (Modern Application and Service Architecture)
functions.description: A financial-grade, cloud-native middleware toolkit built on the “lightweight microservices + intelligent governance + elastic infrastructure” triad; provides service mesh, event mesh, unified observability components, helping business systems achieve efficient development and operations; supports active-active deployments across cities or regions, intelligent traffic scheduling, guarantees 99.999% service SLA; compatible with mainstream microservice frameworks and ESB (Enterprise Service Bus), enabling smooth migration from centralized to distributed systems; supports seamless cross-cloud migration, improving resource utilization and operational automation, with full-stack independent control.

functions.title: Global Service Location System
functions.description: Provides DCN (Data Center Network) location services for application systems.

functions.title: General Load Balancing Management System
functions.description: Load balancing plugin adaptation.

modules.name: Technical Platform
modules.description: Provides basic common capabilities to serve various business systems.

functions.title: File Processing
functions.description: FPS file processing system, serving as a foundational public capability, mainly provides file storage services for various business systems.

modules.name: Customer & Account System
modules.description: Provides a centralized, unified, shared single customer view.

functions.title: Customer Information System (ECIF)
functions.description: ECIF integrates customer information across internal banking products, including customer basics, accounts, and product relationships, to provide a centralized, unified, authoritative single customer view, building a “customer-centric” operational and development system that supports existing business systems and enhances customer experience and market competitiveness.

modules.name: Security Tools
modules.description: Provides unified user identity authentication and permission management capabilities.

functions.title: Unified User Login and Permission Management Platform
functions.description: Unified identity authentication supporting multiple login protocols; users can log into multiple systems with one account; unified permission management and reporting to ensure consistent policies, e.g., unified access requests, automatic removal of departing users’ permissions.
